verses.verse: And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> took his <S%H5265>journey<s%> with all that he <S%H935>had<s%>, and came to <S%H884>Beer-sheba<s%>, and <S%H2076>offered<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> unto the <S%H430>God<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H4759>visions<s%> of the <S%H3915>night<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Here am I.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I am <S%H410>God<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%>: <S%H3372>fear<s%> not to go <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; for I will there <S%H7760>make<s%> of thee a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>:

I will go <S%H3381>down<s%> with thee into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; and I will also <S%H5927>surely<s%> bring thee <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3130>again<s%>: and Joseph shall <S%H7896>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> from <S%H884>Beer-sheba<s%>: and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5375>carried<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%>, and their little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, and their <S%H802>wives<s%>, in the <S%H5699>wagons<s%> which <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> to carry <S%H5375>him<s%>.

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> their <S%H4735>cattle<s%>, and their <S%H7399>goods<s%>, which they had <S%H7408>gotten<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and all his seed with <S%H2233>him<s%>:

his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>' <S%H1121>sons<s%> with <S%H1323>him<s%>, his daughters, and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>' <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, and all his <S%H2233>seed<s%> brought <S%H935>he<s%> with him into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And these are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, who <S%H935>came<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>: <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>, <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H1060>first-born<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>: <S%H2585>Hanoch<s%>, and <S%H6396>Pallu<s%>, and <S%H2696>Hezron<s%>, and <S%H3756>Carmi<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>: <S%H3223>Jemuel<s%>, and <S%H3226>Jamin<s%>, and <S%H161>Ohad<s%>, and <S%H3199>Jachin<s%>, and <S%H6714>Zohar<s%>, and <S%H7586>Shaul<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a Canaanitish <S%H3669>woman<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>: <S%H1648>Gershon<s%>, <S%H6955>Kohath<s%>, and <S%H4847>Merari<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>: <S%H6147>Er<s%>, and <S%H209>Onan<s%>, and <S%H7956>Shelah<s%>, and <S%H6557>Perez<s%>, and <S%H2226>Zerah<s%>; but <S%H6147>Er<s%> and <S%H209>Onan<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>. And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6557>Perez<s%> were <S%H2696>Hezron<s%> and <S%H2538>Hamul<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>: <S%H8439>Tola<s%>, and <S%H6312>Puvah<s%>, and <S%H3102>Iob<s%>, and <S%H8110>Shimron<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>: <S%H5624>Sered<s%>, and <S%H356>Elon<s%>, and <S%H3177>Jahleel<s%>.

These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3812>Leah<s%>, whom she <S%H3205>bare<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> in <S%H6307>Paddan-aram<s%>, with his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H1783>Dinah<s%>: all the <S%H5315>souls<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H1323>daughters<s%> were <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%>: <S%H6837>Ziphion<s%>, and <S%H2291>Haggi<s%>, <S%H7764>Shuni<s%>, and <S%H675>Ezbon<s%>, <S%H6179>Eri<s%>, and <S%H722>Arodi<s%>, and <S%H692>Areli<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%>: <S%H3232>Imnah<s%>, and <S%H3438>Ishvah<s%>, and <S%H3440>Ishvi<s%>, and <S%H1283>Beriah<s%>, and <S%H8294>Serah<s%> their <S%H269>sister<s%>; and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1283>Beriah<s%>: <S%H2268>Heber<s%>, and <S%H4439>Malchiel<s%>.

These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2153>Zilpah<s%>, whom <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H3812>Leah<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%>; and these she <S%H3205>bare<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, even <S%H6240>sixteen<s%> <S%H5315>souls<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>: <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>.

And unto <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, whom <S%H621>Asenath<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6319>Poti-phera<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H204>On<s%>, bare unto <S%H3205>him<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>: <S%H1106>Bela<s%>, and <S%H1071>Becher<s%>, and <S%H788>Ashbel<s%>, <S%H1617>Gera<s%>, and <S%H5283>Naaman<s%>, <S%H278>Ehi<s%>, and <S%H7220>Rosh<s%>, <S%H4649>Muppim<s%>, and <S%H2650>Huppim<s%>, and <S%H714>Ard<s%>.
These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7354>Rachel<s%>, who were <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>: all the <S%H5315>souls<s%> were <S%H702>fourteen<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>: <S%H2366>Hushim<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>: <S%H3183>Jahzeel<s%>, and <S%H1476>Guni<s%>, and <S%H3337>Jezer<s%>, and <S%H8006>Shillem<s%>.

These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%>, whom <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, and these she <S%H3205>bare<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>: all the <S%H5315>souls<s%> were <S%H7651>seven<s%>.

All the <S%H5315>souls<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%> with <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, that came <S%H3318>out<s%> of his <S%H3409>loins<s%>, besides <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%>' <S%H802>wives<s%>, all the <S%H5315>souls<s%> were <S%H8346>threescore<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%>;

and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, who were <S%H3205>born<s%> to him in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5315>souls<s%>: all the <S%H5315>souls<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, that <S%H935>came<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, were threescore and <S%H7657>ten<s%>.

And he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%> unto <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, to <S%H3384>show<s%> the <S%H6440>way<s%> before him unto <S%H1657>Goshen<s%>; and they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> made <S%H631>ready<s%> his <S%H4818>chariot<s%>, and went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>, to <S%H1657>Goshen<s%>; and he <S%H7200>presented<s%> himself unto <S%H5307>him<s%>, and fell on his <S%H6677>neck<s%>, and <S%H1058>wept<s%> on his <S%H6677>neck<s%> a good <S%H5750>while<s%>.

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, <S%H6471>Now<s%> let me <S%H4191>die<s%>, <S%H310>since<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%>, that thou art <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and unto his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, I will go <S%H5927>up<s%>, and <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and will <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H251>him<s%>, My brethren, and my <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, who were in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, are come unto <S%H935>me<s%>;

and the <S%H582>men<s%> are <S%H7462>shepherds<s%>, for they have been keepers of <S%H4735>cattle<s%>; and they have <S%H935>brought<s%> their <S%H6629>flocks<s%>, and their <S%H1241>herds<s%>, and all that they have.
And it shall come to <S%H6547>pass<s%>, when Pharaoh shall <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H559>you<s%>, and shall say, What is your <S%H4639>occupation<s%>?

that ye shall <S%H559>say<s%>, Thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> have been <S%H582>keepers<s%> of <S%H4735>cattle<s%> from our <S%H5271>youth<s%> even until <S%H1>now<s%>, both we, and our fathers: that ye may <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen<s%>; for every <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>.
